Lonely Road #90, Sarah Jane aka Wonderhussy, April 2009

Posted on November 10, 2012 by mike

OK, sorry, I’m a bit out of order. But, OMG…how perfect when you hear what just happened to me. I’m at the Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf near my home in Glendale, AZ and I was just horrified by some bigots blabbing about how angry they are about the election of Obama the socialist and how they now plan to NO LONGER GO TO MEXICAN restaurants in protest! Yes, that’s how the worldly, educated, and open-minded locals roll here?!? Yikes. Anyway…when you get to the pics below, of fabulous Ms. Wonderhussy….one in particular will make a strong statement against these bigots….and I think you’ll have a giggle. Anyway, welcome back, Sarah. The Wonderhussy rocked the Lonely Roads project and is one of my favorite folks in the world! She too loves Burning Man, nudity, Mexican food, Mexicans and Obama….and I love her!

Now…I actually think Republicans can appreciate my work and blog though as well…as there is lots of ASS in my work. So, maybe I’ll be the medium to bring all of us together?

Anyway, Sarah shot with me in April and May of ’09 and here’s what happened in the first of those 2 sessions:

As I’ve mentioned before, this lady is crazy smart, wickedly funny, and just creative as all hell. Follow her blog @ Wonderhussy.com and listen to her raves & rants and experiences. If you’ve ever wondered how “hot” the folks at Vegas Swinger parties look…just check in with Sarah on that blog! 🙂  But, she’s truly PERFECT for me and my work and together we made such a great team …and will do so again. So, for this shoot her KEY contribution was her bright, red phone and pinup girl dress she brought! She knows the kind of fun and wacky stuff that I love to capture and sure enough her pieces were ideal for a situation we encountered with a burned-out RV on the side of the highway North of Vegas.

But, before that, we had a ball playing on these quad trails we ran across just outside of town! Sarah has no fear of being caught naked….bless her heart, and the guys that ended up finding us were the “types” to help me fulfill my anti-bigot post tonight on Facebook. For, when she (and I, LOL) were jumping around naked together, these 2 Mexican dudes pulled up on their quads staring in disbelief at Sarah and probably disgust at me! Anyway, hah, I ran and thru my pants on and in my meager Spanglish told them that i’d like to get them involved in a shot with Sarah. And, after a couple tries…i got this cool jump shot of Sarah hovering above my amigos….and, today, can use that awesome shot to mess with the Conservatives!!! Yes, thank you Ms. Wonderhussy and thank you brethren from the South!

We had such a blast this whole day. God, I look back at it and just smile as so many fun things happened. The Dune Buggy rental guys “helping” us out at the RV. The hispanic quad guys. And…yes…the Ranger @ Valley of Fire who almost caught us. So, in honor of him.. a little video from Sarah:

Shhhh…the ranger is coming

Isn’t she a hoot! Yeah, sexy, funny and just amazing! But, I need to go back and tell more of the story of the Dune Buggy guys. For, when Sarah and I stumbled upon the burned out RV…we thought things couldn’t get any better. But, when these guys pulled up and then confidently joined us for some pictures things did go up another level. And, when the water truck drove by the burned out RV while Sarah stood on it bare-assed ….things even grew to a more epic level!! Oh, yeah, buy my damn book or at least the eBook version and you’ll see all that!

Well..our last adventure that day in April of ’09 involved cruising up to Valley of Fire, a gorgeous park about 45 minutes North of Vegas. Nudity isn’t too cool in state parks…so we had to be a bit careful….and having her run around on the red rocks naked needn’t some caution. Hence, the video. But, she brought her roller skates and zest and rocked some awesome shots on those gorgeous, red rocks! The pic of her with her green shorts falling off her butt along the main road is similar to what’s in the book. But, again, you might actually find the shot in my book even more appealing. If you buy it. Hint, hint.

Anyway…I hope my little story here inspires you to do many things. Add these to your bucket list, OK?

1) Vote Democratic…. and love all of humanity

2) Eat Mexican food and maybe you’ll get smarter

3) Follow the Wonderhussy blog

4) Buy The Lonely Road book and you’ll go to heaven

5) Run naked in public as much as you can
